name: Paradise Lofts 0.22
description:
PARADISE LOFTS  is a comedy, noir, sex thriller adventure/visual novel game hybrid, in development. We're big fans of classic adventure games, so while some challenges will be easy, some won't, but there really isn't any "losing."

The story opens moving into your new apartment, only to be immediately suspended from your job, and dumped by your girlfriend. Following a grisly, neighborhood murder, you begin the journey of getting your life back together, while stumbling through adventures.

Check out our Patreon for the latest updates and game tips.
https://www.patreon.com/ParadiseLofts
